title: Megadeth - Rude Awakening (expanded by }{eywood)
description:
Megadeth
Rude Awakening
expanded by }{eywood

Rude Awakening was recorded primarily at the Web Theatre, Phoenix, AZ on November 17, 2001 with several extra songs added in from the previous night at the Rialto Theatre, Tucson, AZ.  The entire setlist of the two shows, however, was not fully represented.  Thankfully a sampler album called "Still Alive...And Well?" was released that contained the missing songs from the Phoenix show.

What I've done is to put the 3 songs that were missing from the Phoenix show back into their proper place in the setlist.  In the process I restored a great deal of the extreme brickwalling the albums had, removed the disc fades, recut the track indexes and am now happily giving it all to you.

Here's the new tracklisting:

01 Dread an the Fugitive Mind
02 The Conjuring*
03 Kill The King
04 Wake Up Dead
05 In My Darkest Hour
06 Angry Again
07 She-Wolf
08 Reckoning Day
09 Devil's Island
10 Train Of Consequences
11 A Tout le Monde
12 Burning Bridges
13 Hangar 18
14 Return To Hangar
15 Time: The Beginning*
16 Use The Man*
17 Hook In Mouth
18 Almost Honest
19 1000 Times Goodbye
20 Mechanix
21 Tornado of Souls
22 Ashes in Your Mouth
23 Sweating Bullets
24 Trust
25 Symphony of Destruction
26 Peace Sells...But Who's Buying?
27 Holy Wars...The Punishment Due

* these are the songs added in from Still Alive...And Well
